name: The Show Must Go On (Reuta)
description:
You are a magician trying to live while doing the things you love. But being a magician in the 21 century is hard.

But fear not > cause your ancestors gave you a special wand, passed through generations, that helps you cast the best magic tricks in the book.

Run shows, gain money and fame and upgrade your magician skills to be the most famous magician ever!
